query.statement:
SELECT '*' AS CODE, '-Àü Ã¼-' AS CODE_NAME FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION ALL
SELECT A.ARBPL AS CODE, A.ARBPL||'('||B.KTEXT||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM SAPHEE.CRHD AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.CRTX AS B ON A.OBJTY = B.OBJTY AND A.OBJID = B.OBJID WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.WERKS = '1000' AND B.SPRAS = '3' ORDER BY CODE,CODE_NAME
